Quickstart¶

Installation¶

  1. Install using pip:

    pip install django-fa

    Alternatively, you can install download or clone this repo and call pip install -e ..

  2. Add to INSTALLED_APPS in your settings.py:

    'fa',

  3. Use the font-awesome tag library in your templates

Example template¶

{% load font_awesome %}

{# Load CSS #}

{% fa_css %}

{# Display an icon #}

{% fa 'fa-shield' %}
